name: MLMetricKey
desc: A key for the metrics dictionary in an update context.

items.name: class var lossValue: MLMetricKey
items.desc: The key you use to access the current loss (a float value).

items.name: class var epochIndex: MLMetricKey
items.desc: The key you use to access the epoch index (an Int64 value).

items.name: class var miniBatchIndex: MLMetricKey
items.desc: The key you use to access the mini-batch index (an Int64 value) within an epoch.

items.name: class MLKey
items.desc: An abstract base class for machine learning key types.
